    • Class com.asm.text.TextData extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • mText

          char[] mText
          the main string storage

        • mCount

          int mCount
          the length of text

        • mUndoManager

          UndoManager mUndoManager
          Undo manager for undo/redo. May be null, because if undo mode is UNDO_MODE_OFD, all undo history will be destroyed.

        • mCache

          TextData.Cache mCache
          for more faster calculate.

        • mNeedInvalidate

          boolean mNeedInvalidate
          Marks if needed invalidate and already did it. True for need to invalidate and not invalidated yet. Used when only used in view.

        • mDirtyRect

          android.graphics.Rect mDirtyRect
          Marks dirty bounds not invalidated.

        • mInvalidateListener

          TextData.OnInvalidateListener mInvalidateListener
          Called when called TextData.invalidate()

        • mEncoding

          java.lang.String mEncoding
          text encoding.

    • Class com.asm.text.UndoManager extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • mHistory

          java.util.ArrayList<E> mHistory
          history lists

        • mIndex

          int mIndex
          history index

        • mMaxCount

          int mMaxCount
          Max history count. If mHistory.size() > mMaxCount, the first history will be erased. -1 to unlimited size.

        • mUndoMode

          int mUndoMode
          undo mode. Can select UNDO_MODE_...

        • mLastUndoMode

          int mLastUndoMode
          last undo mode. For restore last undo mode.

        • mLastText

          java.lang.CharSequence mLastText
          last texts start from start to count when called beforeTextChanged().

        • mOpenedActions

          Actions mOpenedActions
          opened actions. exist if mode is not closed

    • Class com.asm.widget.codeedit.CodeStyle.ColorValue extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • value

          int value
          the main value.

        • type

          java.lang.String type
          the type of value. null does means color is same as value. '@pref/{pref_name}' does means get color from preferences. in this case, method value will be ignored. '@color/{color_name}' does means get color defined from its parent.
